member.name: ID3D12Tools.EnableShaderInstrumentation
member.summary: This method enables tools such as PIX to instrument shaders.
member.param: TRUE to enable shader instrumentation; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: ID3D12Tools.ShaderInstrumentationEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether shader instrumentation is enabled.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if shader instrumentation is enabled; otherwise FALSE.

member.name: ID3D12Tools
member.summary: This interface is used to configure the runtime for tools such as PIX. Its not intended or supported for any other scenario.
